Class LocationController

extends java.lang.Object

      • deleteLocation

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{name}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Location> deleteLocation(@PathVariable
                                                                                                        java.lang.String name)
        Delete a location post, by name
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of location to delete
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity and if location not found HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND, else HttpStatus.OK
